info.name: Fix New Tumblr Photo Widths
info.description: Restores max width of images and photosets to 500px (as opposed to the new 540px)
info.additionalInfo:
Note, I have not personally tested this on any browser save Chrome. PLEASE CONTACT ME HERE WITH ANY QUESTIONS ---> goodbyemidnight.tumblr.com <----- I do, however, work full time so I'll get to them as soon as I can. 4/8/2015 2:45PM - Wow we had a long run without these. Tumblr made the inline images full width. idk why. But now they're not. 11/18/14 12:00AM - Fixed the video issues in Firefox. They're full width again, sorry, i can't give them margins without them completely breaking :/ Some people claimed margin issues in Firefox and I couldn't reproduce it, but I hope the fixes took care of it either way. 11/13/14 1:40PM - Sorry, didn't catch everything yesterday. Videos should be fixed now as well as inline images! 11/12/14 1:50PM - Tumblr made an update. MY FAVORITE! They changed how some of their photo classes work. Who knows, it's weird. Let's see if these two changes fix it. 11/7/14 6:20PM - Tumblr made an update that changed the max width photos are on the dash. I think they're kinda sorta trying to fix the upload issue. But only kinda. Anyway, fixed the issue of photos that are larger than 500px getting cut off. 11/4/14 3PM - Alright, after some consideration I'm removing the fix for photosets on individual blogs and leaving this as just a dash fix. That said, the fix for viewing photosets on other people's blogs is going to be offered as a separate style HERE. It causes some issues with certain blogs but I know some people still want to use it so it's a hard call. Tumblr did some ridiculous things to their photo API and there's only so much I can do with CSS alone. To fix your personal blog so that anyone can view it properly, with or without a stylish code downloaded, please consider this javascript code here by jumpingpuddles. 10/30/14 10:30 PM EST - Another update, sorry. But I should have all my bases covered by now. I hope. If not, please message me at goodbyemidnight.tumblr.com 11/1/14 12PM - Update to fix photo widths on tumblr blogs. I didn't include the margins in the code cause it could do funky things to themes. Please check out my other styles to bring back the old tumblr.
  • Bring Back the Old Tumblr Blue
  • Best of Both Worlds New Tumblr -- Disable the "fix photos" code to use. Full width photos but kept down to 500px maximum width.
  • New Tumblr Fix -- a collection of random codes mostly just for me, but some of you might want what I want. Restores red notifications in the header as well as makes the header smaller and contained to the width of the dash.
  • Hunger Games Mockingjay Post Icons -- Just for fun. I promise it actually works now and everything.

data.title: Script is interfering with photosets on themes
Also, one of the margins is missing.
Oh, and sometimes the margins are not equal
Thank you for continuing to update this style!
The new update works perfectly!! Cheers :)
